StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [EnlistedPoolBoardFindPerson]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@LastName varchar(50) = null ,@FirstName varchar(50) = null ,@Ssn varchar(20) = null ,@OrgId int )
AS
SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(p.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(p.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS Name ,n.NWA_ID AS NwaId ,p.Last_Name ,p.First_Name ,p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER ,c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE AS EnlistmentDate ,c.PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE AS ProjectedShipDate ,Program = CASE WHEN c.COMPONENT_CODE in ('K4','B5','K8','K9' ) THEN m.BILLET_MOS ELSE (SELECT TOP 1 p.[PROGRAM_CODE] FROM [dbo].[PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY] pa INNER JOIN [PROGRAM] p ON p.[PROGRAM_ID] = pa.[PROGRAM_ID] WHERE pa.[CONTRACT_ID] = c.[CONTRACT_ID] ORDER BY pa.[PROGRAM_ASSIGNMENT_DATE] DESC) END ,(SELECT (COUNT(*) / 2.0) FROM [dbo].[REFERRAL] r WHERE r.[DEP_CONTRACT_ID] = c.[CONTRACT_ID] OR r.[MARINE_ID] = n.[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID]) AS EnlistmentCredits ,hs.HIGHSCHOOL_NAME AS HighSchool ,COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS RecruiterName ,CASE mc.[GENDER_CODE] WHEN 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE 'NotSpeci.ed' END AS GenderCode ,COALESCE( CASE WHEN n.[CATEGORY_CODE] = 'R' AND mc.[GENDER_CODE] = 'M' THEN 'RegularMaleNonPriorService' END, CASE WHEN n.[CATEGORY_CODE] = 'R' AND mc.[GENDER_CODE] = 'F' THEN 'RegularFemaleNonPriorService' END, CASE WHEN n.[CATEGORY_CODE] = 'G' AND mc.[GENDER_CODE] = 'M' THEN 'MaleReserveGround' END, CASE WHEN n.[CATEGORY_CODE] = 'A' AND mc.[GENDER_CODE] = 'M' THEN 'MaleReserveAir' END, CASE WHEN n.[CATEGORY_CODE] IN ('G', 'A') AND mc.[GENDER_CODE] = 'F' THEN 'FemaleReserve' END, CASE WHEN n.[CATEGORY_CODE] = 'P' THEN 'PriorService' END ) AS CategoryCode ,cs.[STATUS_CODE] ,cs.[DISPOSITION_CODE] FROM [dbo].[NWA] n WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[CONTRACT] c ON c.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[MARINE_CANDIDATE] mc ON n.[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = mc.[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] INNER JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] p ON p.PERSON_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Marine m ON p.Person_ID = m.Marine_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] rp ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] rcrtr ON rcrtr.PERSON_ID = rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[CANDIDATE_EDUCATION] ce ON ce.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND ce.EDUCATION_LEVEL = (SELECT TOP 1 level = CASE LEN(educa.on_level) WHEN 1 THEN '0' + educa.on_level ELSE educa.on_level END FROM dbo.CANDIDATE_EDUCATION WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID=n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID ORDER BY level DESC) LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[HIGH_SCHOOL] hs ON hs.SCHOOL_CODE = ce.SCHOOL_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] cs ON cs.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID and cs.[CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID] = (Select max ( [CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID] ) from [dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] where NWA_ID=n.NWA_ID ) WHERE --n.[ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID] = @OrgId AND (p.[LAST_NAME] LIKE @LastName OR @LastName IS NULL OR @LastName = '') AND (p.[FIRST_NAME] LIKE @FirstName OR @FirstName IS NULL OR @FirstName = '') AND (p.[SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER] LIKE @Ssn OR @Ssn = NULL OR @Ssn = '') ORDER BY c.[PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE]
